entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You have successfully rescued the second Imperial Officer from the Rebel Detainment Facility.
entries.journal_entry_description: Search the Rebel Detainment Facility for the next Imperial Officer being held prisoner.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Defeat Lancer Sair in combat and take his Rebel Pilot Uniform.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Get the disguise from Lancer Sair
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Defeat some Rebel Pilots defending the Detainment Facility Computer Rooms.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Defeat some Rebel Troopers defending the Detainment Facility Computer Rooms.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Search the holding cells located at the South wing of the facility, somewhere near the front of the Detainment Facility.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Give the officer the disguise you have.
